meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jason Flowers Vane Lucas Tom Massimo Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4385.

td.p: Jason Flowers, a high school teacher originally from Morgan City, Louisiana
Vane Lucas, a banker from Tulsa, Oklahoma
Tom Massimo, an equity trader from New York, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $23,200)

tr.td: PRESIDENTIAL TERMS OF SERVICE
CLASSIC COMIC STRIPS
WORLD TRAVEL
THE NEXT SOUND YOU HEAR...
PEAS
"Q"s
